document.full_text: alabama's indebted jefferson county can move forward with a lawsuit against jpmorgan chase and others it accuses of selling it corrupt financial products, the state supreme court said on friday.
document.title: alabama county can sue jpmorgan over fraud: court
lines_and_colors: alabama's indebted jefferson county can move forward with a lawsuit against jpmorgan chase and others it accuses of selling it corrupt financial products, the state supreme court said on friday.
